sentences.sContent: Why do we have a manor?
The castle dates from the 1500s and has a rustic charm, reminiscent of a grand West Country manor.
sentences.sContent_eng: The castle dates from the 1500s and has a rustic charm, reminiscent of a grand West Country manor.
sentences.sCn: 城堡的历史可追溯到1500年代，极富乡村魅力，令人回忆起西南各郡的庄园。

phrases.pCn: n. 领主之宅邸；庄园主的住宅

trans.tranOther: a big old house with a large area of land around it
